explains: n. 豆类；豆科植物；豆荚

sentences.en: Many members of the mustard family, spurge family, legume family, and grass family are top hyperaccumulators.
sentences.cn: 芥科植物、大戟科植物、豆科植物和禾本科植物中的许多植物都是顶级的超富集植物。

sentences.en: Is one of the most important legume forages in China.
sentences.cn: 是我国最重要的豆科牧草之一。

sentences.en: The legume has been considered lucky among Southerners ever since.
sentences.cn: 豆荚一直被南方人视为幸运的食物。
